qas.question: What state was dissolved on March 3, 1944?
Who ordered the deportation of the residents of the Chechen-Ingush ASSR?
Why were the residents of the Chechen-Ingush ASSR deported?

answers.text: accusations of collaboration with the invaders and separatism

qas.question: Along with the RSFSR, what republic received territory from the former Chechen-Ingush ASSR?
What state was created on March 3, 1944?
Who ordered the naturalization of the residents of the Chechen-Ingush ASSR?

plausible_answers.text: accusations of collaboration with the invaders and separatism

qas.question: Why were the residents of the Chechen-Ingush ASSR not deported?
Along with the RSFSR, what republic didn't receive territory from the former Chechen-Ingush ASSR?
What state was dissolved on March 4, 1943?

context: On March 3, 1944, on the orders of <a1_0><b5_0>Stalin<b5_0/><a1_0/>, <a0_0>the <b4_0><b8_0>Chechen-Ingush ASSR<b8_0/><b4_0/><a0_0/> was disbanded and its population forcibly deported upon the <a2_0><b6_0>accusations of collaboration with the invaders and separatism<b6_0/><a2_0/>. The territory of the ASSR was divided between other administrative unit of Russian SFSR and the <a3_0><b7_0>Georgian SSR<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
